channel.title: Ubisoft on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dev says Switch 2’s physical Game Cards were too slow for Star Wars Outlaws port
item.description: Data transfer speeds are much lower for Switch 2 Game Cards than for downloaded games.

item.title: After 5 years in development, the Assassin’s Creed TV series is happening
item.description: Series will be led by Westworld, Halo alums.

item.title: ‘Assassin’s Creed’ Live-Action Series Ordered at Netflix
item.description: The long-gestating “Assassin’s Creed” live-action series adaptation is officially moving forward at Netflix, Variety has learned. The news comes nearly five years after it was first
